description: Modernising powers, deterrents and safeguards: I. Penalties reform: the next stage. Consultation paper (29 p.) + draft legislation and commentary (51 p.). II. Safeguards for taxpayers: summary of responses. 21 p. III. Payments, repayments and debt: responses to consultation and proposals (21 p.) + draft legislation and commentary (15 p.). IV. A new approach to compliance checks: responses to consultation and proposals (104 p.) + draft legislation and commentary (65 p.).
